name: FSignColorData
comment: Copyright 2016-2019 Coffee Stain Studios. All Rights Reserved.

properties.name: SignColor
properties.comment: The static mesh that will be rendered on the actual sign in the world

properties.name: ColorName
properties.comment: A text name to display with the icon inside of menus

properties.name: TextMaterialInstance
properties.comment: The TEXT material instance is created at runtime and stored here when it is needed

properties.name: IconMaterialInstance
properties.comment: The ICON material instance is created at runtime and stored here when it is needed

properties.name: BackgroundMaterialInstance
properties.comment: The BACKGROUND material instance is created at runtime and stored here when it is needed

name: UFGSignSettings
comment: Master settings for Standalone Sign parameters and attributes

methods.name: Get
methods.comment: Helper to get signs settings without going through UFGGlobalSettings

methods.name: GetTextMaterialInstanceFromIndex
methods.comment: Returns the corresponding text material instance from the sign color data array. If one does not exist yet it is created

methods.name: GetIconMaterialInstanceFromIndex
methods.comment: Returns the corresponding icon material instance from the sign color data array. If one does not exist yet it is created

methods.name: GetBackgroundMaterialInstanceFromIndex
methods.comment: Returns the corresponding background material instance from the sign color data array. If one does not exist yet it is created

methods.name: GetBackgroundMeshMaterialIndex
methods.comment: Returns the index of the background meshes material index for the background material

properties.name: mTextMaterial
properties.comment: Base material to be used for text component material instances

properties.name: mIconMaterial
properties.comment: Base material to be used for icon material instances

properties.name: mBackgroundMaterial
properties.comment: Base material to be used for sign background material instances

properties.name: mBackgroundMeshMaterialIndex
properties.comment: The index in the sign mesh material array pointing to the screen / background material

properties.name: mTextMaterialColorParam
properties.comment: Parameter name of color adjustment FVector inside the text material

properties.name: mIconMaterialColorParam
properties.comment: Parameter name of color adjustment FVector inside the icon material

properties.name: mBackgroundMaterialColorParam
properties.comment: Parameter name of color adjustment FVector inside the background material
